item.title: 安装与更新python
item.description: 说明 完全是为了记录自己的操作记录，换一台新机器真是免不了要装python。记录下来，便于以后操作。 apt-get安装 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 apt update apt install

item.title: The popular python packages you should know
item.description: Life is short, I use Python. I try to summary the popular python packages as follows: Number and Math sympy Sage numbers math cmath decimal fractions random statistics Data and statistics Matplotlib seaborn numpy pandas plotly Web Development Django FastAPI GUI pyqt PySimpleGUI automation script pathlib os Machine Learning TensorFlow Scikit OpenCV streamlit Web Scraping and Web Automation Requests Beautiful Soup Scrapy Selenium 欢迎关注 欢迎关
